img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy landscape. A character is seen kneeling on the ground, possibly in a defensive or weakened state, while facing another character who appears to be casting a spell or attack, indicated by the lightning-like effects surrounding them. The user interface displays various icons and gauges, suggesting elements of gameplay such as health, abilities, or inventory. Text at the bottom reads "Tremors forge thunder..." and identifies the character as "Kang Jin Star," which may be related to the narrative or a specific event in the game.
